{{namespace.title}}

Device manufacturers and entities managing Vorto models directly on the behalf of device manufacturers are eligible for an official vendor namespace with the name of the device manufacturer. Official vendor namespaces can be used to manage public models.


If you wish to have an official vendor namespace, such as com.acme, you need to drop us an email.

Official vendor namespaces are not meant for specific projects or personal use only.
